Vasantha - the lady who cleaned our room so well, and left a bookmark for my daughter's book as she saw it was still being read.. and left a note for us too! The guys at door were great too.

title: 100% Recommended
desc: Visited the Four Seasons hotel for the first time. Attended by front desk staff Ellie and she was attentive. Requested for late check-out and was granted 2pm check-out. Super grateful as we had conference that stretched from morning to noon. Interior of hotel room was well maintained - toilet, bedding. However the coffee machine in the room was producing dirty cloudy coffee water when I tried to used it. Not sure how it's been maintained. The TV was huge. We were able to mirror our Apple devices and watched YouTube/Safari videos. Netflix is not possible though. Restaurant had limited choices for breakfast. The food was alright. Staff were very friendly and explained to us that the meat they use is halal. Overall, I will return and stay longer :)

title: Excellent Service and Stay
desc: Excellent service and attention from staff. The hotel in Singapore is very well mainained and renovated since it has been around for so many years and with all the competitions. Fantastic room stay and dining experience.

title: Best hotel in Singapore
desc: The four season hotel is gorgeous and its rooms are exquisite and well-equipped. staff are very warm, friendly and professional as well. Easily the best hotel I’ve been to in singapore and I look forward to my next visit.

title: Traveling with my dog
desc: I would like to give some comments for my stay. I’ve stayed in Four Season Hotel for only 1 night with my dog. I have been informed that there is an additional charge for cleaning fee SGD$100. However, I found a lots of sand which were cat litter in the washroom. Second, we went to Lv1 outdoor sitting restaurant for breakfast at 07:30hrs. Be informed by the staff that she is busy, no cold coffee at this moment. I mean I’ve paid the cleaning fee and service fee. I believed this hotel is 5 star hotel as well. How come the service is like this? Other than that, front desk are very nice!

title: A Four Seasons Experience
desc: Have you ever felt romantic alone? A superb cocktail, a fantastic Michelin kind of lunch or dinner… You dont need a boyfriend to have a wonderful loving experience, you do need a Four Seasons experience 😎

title: Amazing stay, wonderful service
desc: One of my best stays in Singapore ever. Everything was top notch. Room was fabulous, spacious and tidy. Bed was amazing and comfortable. Toiletries are fantastic, L'Occitane. Room service is great and delicious. Breakfast in room was included in the rate and was served amazing. Restaurants downstairs were great and service was top notch. Just an overall amazing experience. Will return.

title: Couples staycation
desc: Nice and provide care ☺️ at hotel when I fall down in toilet room. Professional services. Fast and efficient too. They call grab car to sent to nearest emergency hospital. When I back with few stitches. Both night and day manager ask you ok and how your feelings too. Me feel touch about it.

title: Awesome service and location
desc: Excellent service and location. I have stayed at the hotel several times and have been delighted in each instance with the great atmosphere and quality of service. The staff is warm and gracious with a genuine and sincere desire to assist

title: Staycay in SG
desc: Hotel is situated just on the fringe of the orchard shopping belt. Lobby is very elegant and grand, service by the front desk was fast and professional. Managed to check in within 15mins and was given a room on the 13th floor. Room was of good size, reminds me of a slightly smaller version of the valley wing. Bed and pillow was very soft and so for table. If soft wasn’t your cup of tea, can choose another from the pillow menu. Bathroom is big with separate standing shower and bath tub. Amenities were well stocked and of good quality. Swimming pools were situated on the 20th and 3rd floor.. families with children are recommended to go to the 20th floor but the pool on the lower floor is much bigger and has more shade from the sun. Pool staff was superb in making us feel

title: Four seasons SG hotel
desc: What a great experience we had staying at FS Singapore recently. We booked for 3 nights to break up our trip then went onto marina bay sands. We were welcomed Warmly to a Very early check in, as had to wait for our PCR test results they gave us a lovely room at 10am!!! We slept comfortably on the most amazing soft beds the only down side to our stay was the spa was closed due to Covid restrictions a special mention to TAUFIK the concierge who was just very very helpful during our stay nothing was too much trouble and went out of his way to make our stay enjoyable will definitely stay here again when we return to SG

title: Attentive staff, beautiful place
desc: Our favourite hotel in Singapore. Attentive staff, beautiful rooms, thorough housekeeping and a lush oasis location. They went above & beyond to make us feel special on our honeymoon. Thank you! We'll be back.

title: Staff are above 5 star
desc: I had a relaxing 1 night stay at Four Seasons Singapore from 13/11 to 14/11 in room 1403. 1314 means everlasting love in chinese so it was indeed a special date which happens to fall on a weekend. Thus, the booking of this stay at this property listed under AMEX Fine Hotels Collection. The property is fine, decent and comfortable 5 star hotel. Nothing to shout about and I would not have reviewed this hotel if not for the wonderful service which I have received. What I like: -Service from Tuck Wah, the Guest Experience Manager. Though I have not met him, his replies via email were prompt and clear. Easy to communicate with and we had a good understanding. I do not need to repeat instructions and room set-up was exactly how I want it to be. A pity that I did not meet him in

title: Four Seasons Hotel (Pet Friendly)
desc: Almost everything was perfect. Service was great and staffs greeting guests at every corner of the hotel. Being one of the pet-friendly hotel, i should say I',m very impressed. The only minus part is the bed and pillows are too soft to my liking.

title: Comfy bed, great room and amazing service!
desc: The concierge team at the entrance was super attentive. Each time I enter/exit, there was someone there to open the door and greet me. The check in process was smooth and the front desk staff explained the facilities and all my stay details and benefits clearly. She also acknowledged my request for my Prosecco to be delivered to the room at a certain timing. I experienced a minor hiccup with a reservation benefit but it was instantly resolved by the same front desk staff. The room, including the bathroom was nicely furnished. The bed was so comfortable, it's probably one of the best hotel beds that I've came acrossed. There's at least three type-C and standard USB plugs in the room so there is no need to bring the charger head. Overall, the room atmosphere is very comfortable

title: Great service!
desc: VG service! Check in was seamless. I requested for late check out upon check in and was asked until what time was I requesting. My request for late check out was confirmed right away. We opted for the Premier room and was impressed, the room is lovely and spacious and comes with daybed. The pools were so so but it's ok. We were surprised that the breakfast is not an ala carte buffet type but a normal buffet. The options were limited but food quality is great. We loved the bak kut teh. They even have a coffee machine that has great coffee options like capuccino, latte, flat white, near the check in counters where one can just take coffee at their convenience. We were impressed and will highly recommend Four Seasons hotel for your staycay.

title: Amazing!
desc: Stayed here recently, booking a package that included dinner with Prosecco at one-ninety restaurant, as well as breakfast. The total package was $355. Considering dinner for two can set one back at least $160 at one-ninety, I find this deal to be most worth it. We had Beef Short Rib and Roasted Seabass with Avocado Salad and Mushroom Soup for sides. The dinner was excellent, and loved their unique and delicious bread which was baked fresh with the accompanying “bread sticks” stuck to the side. The ribs were juicy and tender, soaked in a delicious sauce. The seabass was also fresh and roasted to perfection. Breakfast had plenty of choices and was featured a collection of high quality items such as the rainbow trout, smoked salmon, tuna, honey glazed ham and a whole other

title: Best staycation ever
desc: Stayed 3nights, hotel gave us an extra bed for my 4yr old son at no extra cost. They also gave him his own kids toiletries and even a small care pack with some goodies. Pros: Kids friendly, pet friendly, easily accessible and ample F&B options nearby. Friendly staff added that personal touch which made us feel unique and not as if we were just another guest. Cons: bed was too soft, which we told the staff after our 1st night and they worked some magic on it making it much better on our 2nd and 3rd night.

title: My Stay in Four Seasons Hotel
desc: This is not my first stay in Four Seasons Hotel for my family of 5, in fact it’s my 4th or 5th stayed. The reason was due to its pets friendly. The hotel stay makes us feel so comfortable just like staying at home. Their room is huge, clean and the staffs is very friendly and helpful. I will definitely chose Four Seasons Hotel again for my next stay.😀

title: A memorable stay
desc: We stayed at Four Seasons Singapore for a week and really enjoyed it. The staff were excellent and polite, we felt the service was one of the best we have ever received. Our room was spacious and clean, the beds were very comfortable. The pools/gym were spotless and well looked after. The location of the hotel is also excellent, plenty of shopping and food options and good transport links. We stayed at 2 other five star hotels during our trip to Singapore, neither of them come even close to the Four Seasons experience. A big thanks to all the staff for making our stay so special.

title: Definitely one of the best luxury hotels in Singapore!
desc: I never thought I’d try a Four Seasons.. In Singapore, specifically! The room was every bit elegant and modern as you’d expect from the brand. The king sized bed was heavenly, the most comfortable that I have ever encountered – extremely fluffy! Bathroom amenities are from L’occitane, which is always a plus point! The bathtub also came pre filled with some rose petals. Turn down service in the evening was very kind. Came back from dinner and was surprised with a little cake :)

title: Best stay in Singapore
desc: After 32 unique hotel stays in Singapore, I am glad to have chosen Four Seasons as my last stay for 2021 with 2 nights over the Christmas weekend. I would probably rank this as my best stay in Singapore. Despite being the busiest weekend of the year, the service was flawless from front desk, telephone operator, mobile chat, F&B to housekeeping. The service in One Ninety was perfect from breakfast service to dinner service. I accidentally left my jacket at One Ninety after check out and this was kept with security for me to pick up a few days later. Mobile app and mobile chat was flawlessly integrated and ensured a seamless stay. There was unfortunately no names on the mobile chat for consistency, but I would really like to send my compliments to them. Lastly, I like to

title: Outstanding stay as VTL travelers
desc: My family of 4 spent 9 nights at the Four Seasons over the holiday break, as VTL travelers from the United States. It was a truly great stay. As others have noted in their reviews, the service at the hotel is absolutely exceptional. Every single person we interacted with was warm, helpful, and kind. We had interesting conversations with so many of the folks at the hotel, who shared recommendations about places to see and eat. The concierge and front desk staff were incredibly responsive - we loved being able to ask questions via the app. We particularly appreciated the fact that despite our 7 AM arrival at the hotel to quarantine after our flight (while awaiting our PCR results), we were not charged for an additional day. The rooms are luxurious and very very comfortable -

title: Staycation
desc: Good experience staying there as they fulfilled my expectations. Food was splendid and staff were polite, friendly and ever ready to render assistance. One of the few hotels in Singapore that is pet friendly and this was a added benefit for me. Will definitely stay again.

title: Our Favorite Hotel!
desc: This is the best room I stayed in in all the hotels I’ve been to. The room and bathroom were huge! The bed, pillows were very comfortable and It made me wanna stay in the room the whole time. I love the bathroom it felt very luxurious. We were also given extra beds even though I didn’t request for it but its appreciated because I have kids. The breakfast was great. There’s not much option but as I mentioned in my other review, this seems to be the norm in all hotels during pandemic. Even so, I love the food especially the breads and coffee. Service is also superb! One disappointment is the in room dining. There’s not much options so we ordered local food. The taste is average, not really a 5 star taste. They have 2 pools and our favorite was the one on 3rd floor which is

title: Classic luxury with 5-star service
desc: It's been a long while since I posted a review, but my recent stay at Four Seasons Hotel Singapore deserves a mention. I was initially apprehensive that the hotel would be old and dated, though I already heard good things about the service. Glad to share that while the hotel isn't new, modern or flashy, it has retained its classic and luxurious appeal, with the common areas always quiet and peaceful despite running at full capacity. The hotel rooms have been recently refurbished and are lovely. Modern but well styled but Peranakan touches, the deluxe room and the bathroom were spacious, comfortable and spotless. Probably the highest hotel bed I've seen , and also one of the more comfortable. I requested for firmer pillows and they were delivered to the room promptly. Which

title: Great Xmas stay!
desc: Four Seasons, from the point you stepped into the hotel till the point of check out, is top notch. The checking in and out at the front desk is fast and efficient while the housekeeping team is polite. The room appeared to be renovated and kept up to pace with technology such as having usb points. It is also easy to book the pool through the messenger app where everything is made so convenient. If I was to nitpick, these are the areas that Four Seasons could probably work on. - My kiddo found a m&m lodged within the sofa but I don’t think it is any fault of the housekeeping unit since it is not easily spotted. - The drainage inlet of the shower cubicle could have been bigger or it could have been struck. Over the two nites we were there, we were essentially showering with our

title: Very satisfied with ther service & the condition of our room. Ambience is also nice.
desc: Had a short staycay with the family. Friendly staffs. Very fast & efficient in responding to our queries & needs. The hotel is also super clean. 5-10mins walking distance to the city centre. Our check-in time was delayed & the concierge is kind enough to keep us updated on the cause of the delay. 👍👍

title: An Amazing Stay
desc: We had our stay booked for a bridesmaid night!!! Room was amazing! Staff was so welcoming right at the door, greeted by an Malay uncle(did not manage to get his name) and warm welcome by Azmi from the reception! He went the extra mile for arranging our takeaway breakfast as we have an early morning the next day! Hand written note were also place in the room. I’m sure we will be back again!

title: Great stay for my elderly parents and dog!
desc: We had a great staycation at Four Seasons Hotel, Singapore. I brought my elderly parents, one of whom is on a wheelchair, and our dog. Everyone had a memorable time. The service of the staff was commendable, and we had so many special requests! The food for our dog was also all well prepared according to our instructions. They had an app where we could easily chat to ask about anything or make reservations - this is such a great idea! Everything was impeccable and the rooms were very clean and comfortable. Thank you, Four Seasons staff, for giving all of us an enjoyable and unforgettable stay!

title: what an amazing stay yet again
desc: There is no comparison. The service that you get at Four Seasons always makes you feel cared for and that your interests come first. "Welcome back again." And indeed that's how I was made to feel throughout my stay. They always accommodate your requests and there's a latent trust always in their guests - no need to show the email as proof that you did a pool booking, no need to inform of your room number when asking for a carpark coupon. It just made my stay so much more pleasant and easy. All their staff are exceptional! The room came ready with extra bed, the toilet and bathtub  (huge by any standard) all spotlessly clean! No stray hairs on the floor or marks on the linen or stains in the toilet. A request for late checkout is granted even when they have to turnaround the room

title: Great experience!
desc: Great experience! Love the Four Seasons App with the Chat function. They really make the effort to respond asap. Little ones are well taken care of. Much attention to details. Appreciate. Love the One-Ninety restaurant too. Also discovered the linkway from Four Seasons to Hilton. Will always appreciate the service from Four Seasons. Thanks!

title: Christmas Staycation
desc: Definitely a great place to have a Christmas Staycation especially with the vintage decor and Christmas Tree that put you straight into the holiday season mood and let's you feel like you are in overseas Great service and warm hospitality. Pay great attention to details which set apart from other 5 Star hotel Definitely looking forward to have my next Christmas Staycation ️ However there was some unexpected incident happened during our stay but was solved amicably by the Housekeeping Team. Hope to see improvement on their staff

title: Well maintained hotel and great location!
desc: Well maintained hotel! I have never consider staying at four seasons considering the number of years it has been around. But COVID and Christmas gave us a chance since we had tried most of the hotel around the vicinity. Upon walking in, hotel smell nice and was well maintained throughout. I had very low expectations of the room but it surpasses me! I asked for an extra bed for our toddler and they also placed kids amenities around. Very nice touch! Overall, we are very pleased and will consider staying again for the price and location! Well done for keeping such a old building so well kept!

title: Second time, remains pretty faultless
desc: We stayed for special occasion, 2 adults and 1 6 year old. They arranged for a high floor, extra bed and extra kids toiletries without prompting, and every staff member we met was delightful and did their best to provide a personal experience. Remains a hotel worth the extra spend.

title: Premier King Bed Room
desc: The best 5 star hotel so far! Excellent service, spacious room & toilet. Thank you Chris Chen from reservation department for the complimentary upgrade room after knowing my situation. Everything is tiptop! Keep it up Four Seasons Hotel. We are planning to return again next month!

title: Good experience with the staffs and mobile app
desc: I We had enjoyed our stay in Four Seasons Singapore. Firstly, thanks for the complimentary cake after knowing my birthday. Secondly thanks for specially arranged an extra bed for my daughter. We didn’t really expect and had prepared to sleep together on the king size bed. Thirdly, thanks for taking the extra to get my daughter an extra set of toiletries that include a kid toothbrush and toothpaste. This was something special that we didn’t expected and were grateful that you had prepared all these after I had messaged in the app messenger about my birthday and my daughter. The replies from the app messenger was amazingly instantaneous and personal. I am able to book swimming at the same hour as the staff manning the messenger was able to find out the capacity and advise us on

title: Travel during VTL
desc: I travelled to Singapore from Melbourne via the VTL, with my daughter. The 4 Season hotel made this a wonderful experience. They provided inexpensive ART (RAT) tests for us and made booking anything easy with their app via the chat link. Both the pools were lovely and we were given extra time to use these facilities. Room service was great as was the bar for cocktails and satays. ION shopping mall is a short stroll and has a fantastic food court on B4 level. Check in and out were uncomplicated and all the staff were efficient and friendly. I would highly recommend this hotel for all VTL travellers.

title: Great hotel to explorer Singapore
desc: Excellent service and good location. Clean and efficient - everything you need for a business trip (and holiday). Located near the MRT and close to shopping destination. Great roof top pool and chill out area.

title: Pleasant Surprise - Top Notch Service
desc: Celebrated wedding anniversary with plenty of positives from the hotel. This is the first time at this hotel chain and indeed the service is top notch. Decoration and setup of the room was impressive even with less than 48 hours notification. Response from hotel was swift and quick. Room service (food) at 1am was also impressive. Highly recommended for anyone who wants to impressed their partner.

title: Service is exceptional as usual
desc: Hotel is near the shops of Orchard Road. Ad you'd expect hotel has great spacious and clean rooms, the gym facilities are lovely (as is pool area). The differentiator with other five stars - is the service - the service at other places is great -but the four seasons does it just slightly better - they anticipate what you want before you ask - they follow up ideal queries - they notice that you have a gluten intolerance (wife) and make sure that gluten free alternative are on hand.

title: Staycaytion
desc: The hotel offers excellent view of Orchard Road as we selected the Boulevard City View Room. Amenities provided by the hotels in the room were top notch, the king size bed was comfortable, the rain showers in the room were refreshing. Breakfast served was delicious, The facilities offered by the hotel were awesome such as Gym, Rooftop pool, Lap pool and Jacuzzi. It is one of the best hotel I ever stayed at.

title: Best service staffs ever especially from the morning buffet restaurant
desc: I would like to express the gesture of the hotel room service for making me and my partner , Andrew with a blessed and personalised birthday balloon and mirror scripting We were surprise as well while we dine at the morning buffet restaurant, you guys even gave us a waffle decorated with candle which makes us surprise Server Sanjav was superb and attentive to our needs especially our coffee

title: Different experience on every stay
desc: I stay several hotel but didn't experience confusing upon check out day. Need check thru apps n call front desk to ensure didn't over the timing. Poor experience on second times although hotel is really comfortable to stay. When enjoy breakfast is nobody to let you know what to do n which selection you may consider. Maybe first stay experience on Four season is too wonderful so I expectation high. Although second trip need worth $600+ but is not worthy when I choose between Four Season n Mandarin Oriental Hotel choice.

title: Amazing food and Cocktails!!!!
desc: We visited the Chinese restaurant in Four Seasons Singapore twice. As a family we had dinner on 31st December 2021 . Loved the delicious food and amazing cocktails. The staff were so accommodating, friendly and polite catering to all our wishes. We enjoyed the dinner so much that decided to go for lunch on 16th January 2022 again. It was our daughters birthday so we had a celebratory lunch! As usual the staff made us so welcome and fussed around our daughter. Would recommend this restaurant to everyone!

title: Feb 2022 Valentines Day + Pawcation
desc: Stayed from 12th feb - 14th feb with my partner and his dog. Superb suite. Lovely pet amenities and great service from hotel staffs The view wasn't that great as it was facing the construction site but the room was big enough for our furkid to run and move about, which made us to forget the view Nice breakfast - we had it at outdoor area. Maybe a suggestion - possible for to make netted fences to prevent birds coming to the outdoor dining area. I realised our dogs and few other dog owners felt abit uncomfy for the birds keep coming in which disturb our breakfast time. Otherwise, a very nice hotel

title: Amazing experience and sure to come back for
desc: If we stay at Singapore for travel from Oz to anywhere, we used to choose Marina Bays Sands usually. This was the first time we stayed here and we felt so good that we will definitely be back here. The hotel fits all standard necessary checklists for 5 star, however, the experience is made special by staff. I rarely had such a good experience with staff while having breakfast... Charlie was phenomenally good and friendly with our toddlers. Overall, a way more warm hospitality experience. Finally, on the last day, as we had late night flights, reception easily extended our stay without fuss for half day.

title: This is the worst Four Seasons Hotel we have ever stayed at.
desc: Stay clear of this one. This is a Super 8 dressed up as a Four Seasons. Staff was confused and rude and very inexperienced. Concierge had no local knowledge whatsoever, he/she sent us to closed restaurants, closed attractions, it was absolutely unacceptable. Hotel condition was run down, paint on the door hinges, towel rack wobbling on the wall, toilet seat crooked, dated furnishings, stains of our sofa, the list goes on and on. Waste of money. Only thing going for it is the location in Orchard. This hotel and how we were treated there has made us not want to return to Singapore.

title: Room
desc: Really so good nice my family also happy really I'm coming to next week 1 more time I really feel happy to saty Thayer thanks so much really amazing feel so happy I don't want leaving other place I really love

title: Standout service with a luxurious, quiet, ambience.
desc: Four Seasons hotel ranks high in the listings, and it isn't immediately apparent why. From the outside and in certain areas (e.g. the pool areas), the hotel is a little dated. However, all areas are immaculately maintained, while some public areas are currently under renovation and likely to be refreshed. Throughout the public areas, flower arrangements and the decor gives a garden-like atmosphere, somewhat akin to the Botanic Gardens. The bedrooms (recently renovated) are refreshingly comfortable and luxurious, without being ostentatious. Rooms are generally quiet (occasionally noise from neighbouring rooms), beds are comfortable, and capsule coffee provided. Views from the room are generally nothing to write home about, sadly. The standout has to be the service - turndown

title: So classy
desc: This is such a classy hotel. Besides the beautiful ambiance, the service received at the entrance elevated the morning. Felt it from the doorman who walked me to the lift to the service staff that served me the coffee. I was treated like a prince.

title: Simply awesome!
desc: Celebrating our 20th wedding anniversray here at Four Seasons Orchard Singapore and I cant wait to write my commendation. So here is a quick one. The service is beyond awesome. Ellie, Karen, Sanjay, and Fal, are all friendly and super accomodating. The hotel remembers our big day and quite sincere in making our celebration a memorable one. Room is great. Food is worth it.

title: Four words: I will be back!
desc: Thank you Gladys, Jane, Raymond, Mun Yee and Shou Wei for making our experience so memorable. Tip top service with a smile and we will definitely be back. We were given personalised and efficient check in and we were sad to check out. Breakfast was delicious and was promptly seated and taken care of despite the queue and crowd. Always nice to be greeted by name and recognised when we were on a celebratory staycation. Very professional service by the banquet team. We appreciated the extra mile gone for us as well as flexibility and patience extended to us.

title: Impressive
desc: One of the best rooms we had stayed in. Was large and comfortable. Can't with coffee machine and a wireless Bose speaker which we used often in the morn and evening wind downs. Special mention of their bath room, which was large and impressive. Housekeeping, room service, reception were all prompt and good in their service. Really enjoyed our stay and look forward to visiting again.

title: Service, service, service. And the bed
desc: I could tell you many things to love about the Four Seasons. I could share that the rooms are huge and sumptuous, with the smallest rooms already coming in at almost 50 sqm. I could talk about the high quality breakfast that greeted us each morning at One-Ninety. I could also touch on the wonderful location, right in Orchard (with a two minute walk to Wheelock Place) but yet blissfully cocooned from all the hustle and bustle.    Instead, I am just going to focus on the two things that set this hotel apart from the pack. All five-star hotels pride themselves on service. But the Four Seasons has not only taken it to another level, they have pretty much perfected it I feel. It is not just the warm smiles that greet you throughout the hotel. You actually see the staff going lengths

title: Wonderful!
desc: Beautiful hotel with a lovely relaxed feel. Delicious food and a pretty outdoor terrace to eat or have a drink on. Staff were wonderful with nothing being too much trouble. Special mention to Karen and the rest of the pool team who made our days at the poolside very relaxing and comfortable. Housekeeping were excellent and the room was always spotless. We will definitely return.

title: Exceptional Hotel - Perfect Stay!
desc: What separates this hotel from the rest is the exceptional staff. From the moment we arrived to the moment we left, my wife & I felt special every step of the way. Facilities are super clean & have of touch of class about them. Location of property on Orchard Boulevard is near perfect as it’s situated near Ion Shopping Complex & MRT. We will definitely be returning to stay at Four Seasons Singapore when next visiting!

title: Unremarkable stay
desc: Check in time was 3 pm and they could not accomodate me even 15 minutes before that despite the fact that half the rooms were empty. Also when we checked in there was no introduction to services available at the Hotel. No one came with us to the room to brief us about the facilities either. There were a lot of smiles and gestures but there was no warmth is what i felt. There was no personal touch in the room either. No fruit, not even a simple cookie and thats surprising for a hotel of this standard. With great reluctance they extended our check out by 90 minutes. The door men are courteous and efficient. There is nothing in this property that will take me back there again.

title: Lacking the personal touch
desc: It's a great hotel , lovely location and amenities. Room sizes, bath and sleep quality were perfect. But somehow lacks the personal touch and bereft of the warmth that you would usually associate with a hotel of this class. Was left to wonder until we asked about facilities, they had a great restaurant but got to know too late. Not being picky but just that one would expect a better level of service with a hotel this class.

title: Pleasant stay
desc: The hotel is located near orchard road. You have to walk a bit until you find the main orchard area and it's not close to any MRT station. So I can't say it convinient. But if you travel by taxi it would be convinient and easy to get taxi. The hotel is a bit dated but room got renovated and so comfy. Breakfast was a bit too average and not so many variety, i can say a bit disappointed. Every staffs were polite , four seasons standard. Got a promo for 3 pay 2 and it was very worth. Nevery doubt to come back again.

title: Heaven
desc: The most best hotel's in singapore,excellent service and i recommend the couples to come here! Very comfortable and the spa is so relaxing ,i love the view from the swimming pool and the buffet are super good

title: Wonderful stay
desc: My first time in Singapore in over 10 years. I decided to try the Four Seasons and it was a delightful stay from the very start. I was upgraded to a lovely room. Everything about this hotel is good, reception, the bar, doormen and the wonderful concierge team who re as lly helped me out when s slight crisis occured. The only negative remark was the breakfast service with highly stressed staff and not at the same standard as at the bar. All in all a terrific stay.

title: Perfect stay in singapore
desc: From beginning to end the hotel catered to all my requests. I truly enjoyed my stay here. So many things to say that I put in already in my suggestions but I have to say attention to detail is amazing. One amazing example is I went for a long run outside of the hotel. And as I was returning the hotel doorman gave me a cold drink. This level of attention is really amazing. The best thing was the stuff.

title: Four seasons is a cut above the rest. Perfect location and excellent service
desc: The rooms are superb. Every detail is magnificent. I love the layout. The bathroom itself is like a dream. Most of all, I love the service. The concierge team is very efficient and prompt and responsive. I will never stay anywhere else in Singapore. I stayed here for 10 days with my wife and 3 kids. Hats off tor Sherwan of concierge for handling all my reservations including the antigen tests for flying out of Singapore.

title: Charmed by the hospitality at Four Seasons Singapore
desc: We stayed three nights at Four Seasons Singapore with our twins aged 5, and we were completely charmed by the hospitality of this spectacular hotel. The hotel is conveniently located on Orchard Boulevard and helped us easily access most places in Singapore. There were so many little treats that we found there which gave us instant happiness. To name a few: a welcome hamper, kiddo dental kit, kiddo slippers, kiddo bathrobes, stuffed toys on arrival, baby soap and shampoo. They loved it all. The breakfast spread was excellent and on table service was great. It was a pleasure staying at this hotel and we will definitely come again on our next trip! Thanks a lot, Four Seasons for making our Singapore stay special!

title: Fantastic, lovely, top notch! Best of the best as said by trip advisor and it’s true! Go to hotel in Singapore everytime
desc: Brilliant stay coupled with great hospitable staff and wonderful service throughout. Great location, good ambience. Charles, nur, tuck, gladys and team were very kind to say the least! Will surely visit again. Shops and restaurants within walking distance

title: centrally located for my needs
desc: As expected from such a hotel. Most other hotels had their amenities and room cleaning services to seemingly a bare minimum. But this hotel's consumable amenities was still pretty decent. I didn't feel short-changed for the price I paid.

title: Nice Stay
desc: Lovely hotel with great staff who were always attentive and happy to help. Rooms were spacious, modern and extremely clean with all the amenities you would expect from this type of hotel. Breakfast was a buffet in the restaurant with a large variety of hot and continental foods and juice. Snacks and beverages in the bar were good and room service was efficient and generous. The location was good and close to the shopping belt of Orchard Road.

title: Best Decision
desc: This hotel has been wonderful. I literally just typed a whole paragraph of contentment and spent the last 20mins giving wonderful feedback to their survey questions. Service was just amazing. The rooms are elegant and widely spaced! Something you cannot get in newly built hotels these days. The attention to detail from check in to check out sets the bar so high. In my itinerary I planned to start breakfast by 8am and be on our way out the city by 9am but the sleep quality we had was just so good— we always end up sleeping in and getting up at 9am instead. Location wise, don’t get fooled in Google Maps that it’s away from the main Orchard Road, the hotel has an air conditioned connection to a mall and VOCO Hotel right smack Orchard Road. Trust my word for it, you won’t regret

title: Excellent service, amazing staff and beautiful hotel
desc: It was an excellent service from check in all the way to check out. We enjoyed our stay. The staff are all attentive and helpful and ready to assist when need help. It was a beautiful short staycation for the family. The facilities are clean and sanitized at all times. It was pandemic so all precautionary measures are strictly adhere by staff and instructed guest to follow. We feel safe and enjoyed our staycation.

title: Amazing Service!
desc: Such a pleasant stay. We moved here from a hotel in Sentosa and there was a day/night difference in the efficiency of the staff. Rooms are large and have been updated recently I believe. Love the toiletries! The location is great and my kids had an amazing time. We had 2 rooms and loved that our room keys worked in either room - such a cool feature. All good things - the key is the quality of their staff who are available to help at every turn.

title: Best venue to host a meeting in Singapore
desc: This is by far the best venue to hold a meeting or a conference in Singapore rn. Michelle was a great coordinator and planner before the event. And Fandi was the best onsite person ever. The whole team was attentive and proactive to not just the guests but also the event crew. Everything went smooth as butter. Will definitely do more events in this hotel again.

title: best of the best
desc: from the luxury amenities, carpet, beddings, automatic curtain, all the 7 stars standard, the royal suite room is exceptional big and very nice for entertaining friends and family. the location awesome just step away from orchard road. everything is luxurious from top to bottom. concierge service is excellent. very quiet at night.

title: Superb as usual
desc: As usual one word for any four seasons property across the world “ superb “. That’s all is needed to define our stay, the food, housekeeping etc etc etc. The staff the hospitality is at par with the best in the world. Special mention for Taufiq at the concierge he really helped me with one of the issues with another hotel.

title: Wonderful stay at Four Seasons Singapore
desc: Truly enjoyed my stay here at FSS. I held my wedding here and I am very impressed by their service. They have wonderful facilities too. e.g. their gym is well-equipped, they have tennis courts, great swimming facilities and smart TVs in their spacious rooms. Widespread of delicious dishes too at their breakfast restaurant. Delicious in-room dining and super prompt service via their communication app. Strongly recommend everyone to stay here!

title: Exceptional !!!
desc: Four seasons Singapore is a truly exceptional hotel. Large rooms, exquisite washrooms, supremely comfortable beds, polite and prompt service and amazing attention to detail. The breakfast is great if you are a non vegetarian and love cold cuts. There is an ice machine on every floor which is super convenient. The bathroom toiletries are L'occitane and the bathrooms are super comfortable and large. The staff is very well trained and the customer service standards are really high. It is a short walk from the famed Orchard road. I cannot recommend this hotel enough.

title: Great property for the area.
desc: The room was well designed with decor and fixtures to match the level expected in a prestigious hotel as Four Seasons. Attentive staff, good security features on the property and excellent food in the restaurant. This property has upped the ante, at least in my book, when it comes to choosing a hotel.

title: Wow! An exceptional hotel in the heart of Singapore!
desc: I stayed at Four Seasons Hotel in Singapore twice as bookends for my trip to Maldives. My first stay was for 3 days and the second stay was for 1 day. The Four Seasons was like a home away from home during my stay! While it can be said that good service should be expected from any Four Seasons properties, I believe the staff here is a notch above. Every interaction with the staff was starts with a smile and is incredibly pleasant. You can see that they make an effort to remember every customer. The staff at the breakfast buffet especially the host was exceptional. With two kids, they made every effort to accommodate the kids and made sure they had their favorite cereals available every morning. The location of the hotel is perfect in my opinion particularly for my short

title: Best hotel in Singapore
desc: We have stayed in quite a few hotels in Singapore but this is our favorite. The rooms are spacious with comfortable beds and nice decor. The lobby and lounge is elegant and soothing. The location is perfect and there are great restaurants within walking distance. But what makes this hotel stand apart is the staff, they are all gracious, helpful, cordial, helpful and the customer service is six stars. We can’t thank the staff enough for the wonderful service. For a Four Seasons in an expensive city the pricing is surprisingly reasonable. This is a five star hotel and not to be missed!

title: Singapore stay
desc: This was my 3rd time at the Four Seasons Singapore. I have stayed at other properties there but this was by far my favourite in Singapore. Everyone is so sweet and kind there. All categories of the room are extremely comfortable and the service is phenomenal. Although I’m not a big fan of their breakfast options wish the spread could be better but everything else is a thumbs up for me.

title: Serious issues but awesome location
desc: So, we had planned two x 1 week stays at FS:SG travelling with two adults and two teens. We booked interconnecting rooms and the rates were quite favourable at around 550 SGD per night per room for the first week, and about 100SGD more per room for the second room. Considering that Singapore is by no stretch of the imagination a cheap destination, it was fine. My evaluation will be be influenced by this fairly low rate paid. Upon arrival late sunday night we arrived and was set up in two rooms on a low floor (8) overlooking a construction site. The first thing we noticed was that the rooms were super humid. As in, the bedding was wet. Everything seemed wet/damp. We also had a strong smell of mildew in the adults room. The kids room was worse. It stank of cigar smoke. Not just

title: Service not as high as you may expect
desc: We had a stay at the Four Seasons. The Four Seasons is a nice hotel, but the price is too high for this service. The staff are kind, but we had to ask more than once for some simple thing to be arranged. We had to wait for an extra bed while this was asked hours before and everyone being tired due to jetlag.

title: Would definitely stay again
desc: Stayed for delayed honeymoon and the staff were incredibly attentive and sent up chocolate strawberries. The bathroom was gorgeous and water pressure is amaaazzinggg! Everything about the stay was lovely

title: Unsatisfactory
desc: Booked a room with their agent in Singapore for two twin beds and when I arrived the room wasn’t ready and had to share a bed or wait an hour after the check in time. Ordered cat service and my flight was moved and I told them ahead of time and when it was time to go they never informed me or anything that I didn’t have a car. Waited around til they told me I didn’t have a driver and taxi would be better. Hotel is nice and clean and staff was friendly but won’t be coming back. You can stay somewhere else and save money because it’s not worth it. Will not be staying there again.

title: Nice stay but bad concierge experience
desc: The room was spacious and very quiet, which is positive aspects. However the breakfast can be improved (variety and quality). Also I observed that you are experiencing staff shortage especially in Concierge area. When I finished my checked out and want to drop my luggage at concierge, I need to waited for almost 30 minutes because there is only 1 lady who busy helping other guest to book a show..

title: 5 star hotel- Great service, excellent rooms and location
desc: We stayed at the Four Seasons Hotel in Singapore for 8 nights in the Premier Room with 2 adults and 2 children (age 6 and 8). Our in laws were staying in the Boulevard room next to us. The room was spacious, well set up, the beds were super comfortable and the amenities were of high quality Loccitane products- my favourite. The kids were treated so well and had a Four Seasons Lion soft toy each with a lolly pack. All the staff were so helpful, friendly and professional and made our stay so comfortable and welcomed. The gym is new and very spacious with excellent equipment. The concierge Johan and Taupik (apologies if I got Tau’s name wrong) were amazing. So helpful and friendly. The hotel Is also close to a major shopping centre- Ion where there are lots of food options

title: Excellent Hotel
desc: On our last night of a Week staying here and if you are looking for a 5 star Hotel this is the one for you. Close to so many sights and attractions, not to mention bars and restaurants. Their new Nobu restaurant is simply sublime and is a must when visiting. Outstanding service throughout the Hotel and they made our first visit to Singapore a special one. Special mention for Giovanni Speciale for his exceptional customer service. Book now

title: Excellent And Quiet Corner Of Orchard Road Area
desc: Pros : Excellent service, very good food & beverages, quiet corner of the busy Orchard Road area, very clean & well maintained hotel, true to its reputation and comfortable bed. Cons : Hotel compound is small, some distance from Orchard MRT and limited shopping in the hotel premises.

title: Pleasant stay
desc: Staying here for 4 nights. Hotel is located in prime orchard location. Walking distance to hotel, mall and MRT station. Staff are nice, room is spacious, the staff and service was AMAZING. Will be back here for sure. Room: 9/10 Cleanliness: 9/10 Location: 9/10 Staff and service: 10/10 Keep up the good work and what a pleasant stay :)

title: The perfect hotel for a singapur visit
desc: the four seasons hotel in singapur is a perfect location for a stay in singapur. all off the staff members are excellent and the hotel is perfectly situated near the orchard road. we will definitly come back

title: Exceeded my Expectations
desc: Overall, a great stay at FS Singapore. It's all about the small details that made my experience really wonderful throughout my stay. I also caught Covid during my stay and I was very well taken care of during my isolation period. Rooms are nicely renovated and also LOVE the new gym as well (easily one of the best hotel gyms I've ever seen). If you are staying in Orchard, look no further and would highly recommend to stay in this lovely property!

title: A Thoughtful Experience
desc: The FS hotel may not be the latest or trendiest in Singapore, but it may be the most thoughtful and intelligent. My family were well looked after during our recent stay with the hotel taking extra measures to ensure our comfort with our toddler. It was our first time overseas with her and the Four Seasons made it a lot easier with baby products unexpected but all provided. Service and luxury are all standard at this hotel as you would expect.

title: Great 5 Star Hotel
desc: Singapore probably has the best choice of 5 star hotels in the world to choose from, over the years I've tried at least 20 and this is up thee with the best. Superbly clean with very large rooms, an excellent brand new gym with the highest latest tech equipment. Superb breakfast with multiple global food choices, staff are of the highest quality.

title: Relaxing Birthday Stay with Family!
desc: The property was extremely comfortable matched by top notch service. They helped us start our 3 day journey off right with a very early check in straight from a red eye flight. The redone rooms were exquisite in a minimalist way with a high floor view. We just felt so at home, especially given the attention they gave to the comfort of our 2yr old. Highly recommended for families with young children!

title: Luxury on Orchard
desc: Fantastic place to stay, when visiting Singapore. Quiet location, almost felt like on the outskirts, yet right in the heart of the city close to everything. Luxurious, but not as expensive as the other 5 star hotels on Marina Beach - still close to it all.

title: Exemplary customer care
desc: The Four Seasons Hotel Singapore has a customer care culture that is unique for a large hotel in my experience. From arrival, when the people at the door read your name from the baggage tags and address you accordingly to reception where the formalities of check in are brief and fast, there is a feeling that the hotel will go out of its way to ensure your comfort. If an advance check in has been made, you can go straight to your room. Rooms are spacious, spotless clean and serviced twice a day. Every request is promptly attended to. We needed extra water, and there were always plenty of bottles kept for us. A guest is welcomed back every time he goes out and returns, and the bar and restaurants go out of the way to provide what is asked for. My wife celebrated her birthday

title: Fantastic hotel
desc: What can I say-superb in every respect-class personified-rooms,service,cleanliness-concierge-location.food.All top class-well done team four seasons keep it up- no wonder its the best hotel in Singapore

title: A Remarkable Stay!
desc: Superb Stay! Many Thanks to All The Staff of FSS namely Audrey (Executive Pastry Chef) Rosli (Kitchen) Raj (Pastry Chef) Vincent (Asst Mgr) Germaine (Waitress) Johari (Concierge) Ellie (Front Desk) just to name a few. They were very accountable to their own respective task, as per se. Will def return and stay at FSS arguably The Best Hotel in Singapore in terms of Hospitality, so to speak.

title: Excellent service and convenient location.
desc: First time staying at Four Seasons and was very impressed with the attentive staff. Check in was a breeze, and the room was quiet and just what I needed for a comfortable business trip. Gym was also great.

title: Nice stay and enjoyed the time there
desc: Had a pleasant stay at the hotel for 3 nights. Staff displayed excellent service - especially the bell staff and front desk who were helpful in giving me advice on what to eat. Beds were comfy and housekeeping were excellent.

title: Singapore’s Finest Hotel
desc: We stayed at the Four Seasons Hotel in Singapore for part of our honeymoon. It was our first Four Season stay so we had high expectations. Quite frankly, was one of the best hotels we have ever stayed at. Each staff member always had a smile on their face and greeted us each time we walked by. As a gym fiend, the gym was on par of what I expect at a high end hotel. It was fantastic. The spa was great as well. Using the Four Seasons app, you could get whatever you needed at a moments notice. For example, we needed a pair of scissors and within 5 min someone knocked on our door with this fancy four seasons bag, scissors inside. Rooms were very spacious and nice with incredibly comfy beds (we stayed in boulevard room). We highly recommend this hotel when in Singapore! We will be

title: Perfect luxury escapes
desc: After a long break, it’s time to travel and find a short escape. Can’t fault all and this is a perfect stay from arrival to departure. There’s a family pool on the 20th floor and a lap pool on the 3rd floor. Gymn is also on the 3rd floor and well equipped. Thoroughly enjoyed the room and amenity and also the breakfast. Need to plan a quick return soon.

title: Best Brews
desc: Served by Nabilah @ Best Brews. Impressed by her friendly gestures, conversation and recommendations. Definitely a gem staff to cherish in a hospitality industry. Thank you for serving us with great personality and kindness! 👍👍👍

title: Wonderful staycation w personalized service
desc: Thank you for your care and concern during my stay, all of FS team members are lovely and sincere, truly refreshing to be greeted and treated so nice, it reflects the hospitality culture within FS are so ingrained, though I had a bit of injury, overall staycation was wonderful and memorable

title: Amazing hotel
desc: Great service Clean Great location Breakfast was amazing What else can I say. It is exactly what one would except from Four season hotel. And the bed….wow…it was so comfortable After a day of walking it was the best

title: Good, but not great.
desc: Generally nice 4-nights stay with my wife and daughter with no problem. Yet overall experience was a bit short of expectation. Location was a short walk to Orchard, but somewhat too quiet, not as vibrant as my initial expectation. I knew the hotel was dated but it was well refurbished. But somehow it missed something special as other four seasons that I’ve been to although those were old ones too. Room was spacious & functioning. The view was so so. Breakfast was good, but was not great. It didn’t feel as refined and some plates didn’t taste good. House keeping was also not that neat in my view. Forgotten to refill tissue box, unattended spots here and there, small things.. Requested for just 1-2 hour late checkout but was declined due to whatever reason.. (Didn’t seem to

title: The Four Seasons is exceptional, as always.
desc: As always, the Four Seasons does an exceptional job. What was even more impressive this time is there was a major conference taking place, but the staff were still engaged, attentive and highly professional. Management knows how to run a tight ship. A few highlights: - The bar area is excellent for meeting clients or friends. It is lively and well laid out. - Although the hotel has been around a long time, the rooms seemed surprisingly new, fresh and up-to-date. - The fitness center is excellent. It is spacious and well-stocked with all the equipment. - The WhatsApp concierge service worked well. They helped me book a cool restaurant. It saves so much time if all you need to do is text the concierge. Overall, an excellent experience!

title: Good experience overall but not spectacular
desc: Knowing that our flight would land at Changi at 5 AM, we reached out tot he hotel about a month in advance to let them know we would be arriving extremely early to see if a room might be available. They agreed to put in the request, and did so. When we arrived (about 6AM), we were told that there was no room available. We knew this was a possibility and were prepared to wait for check-in time. But here's the problem! We were then told that, if we agreed to pay S$348, one would be cleaned up for us immediately and made available. And low and behold, it was! A pretty sleazy tactic, if you ask me. But we got in to the room early and crashed! And the hotel made some extra $$$ in knowing that they had us in a bind. We had one of the Boulevard King rooms, and it was nice,

title: Nice stay - great location
desc: Very typical Four Seasons hotel. Overall the room was lovely, breakfast was great, location was convenient and central. Almost everyone we came into contact with was pleasant, helpful, and genuinely nice. Arrived after a 19+ hour flight at around 2AM. Was surprised the bellman didn't open the taxi door, offer to help with bags, or even say hello. This was genuinely confusing considering they were overly courteous and kind every other day. Weird start to our stay in Singapore, but otherwise it was great.

title: Satisfactory Stay
desc: I had recently stayed at the Four Seasons during a work trip and was overall satisfied with the stay, the food was good and the staff were courteous, with four seasons you can never go wrong, will recommend to all to try out

title: Four Seasons Singapore fail
desc: Certainly well below expectations, I have provided direct feedback to the hotel already but not yet received a response. Booked here because of tennis facilities on site, after (yes, after) check-in, told that tennis courts weren't available and that I'd have to travel offsite ($150+in additional taxi fares later) + 4 hours of wasted time travelling to/from. Not only charged for the use of court which was 20 minutes away but wasn't anywhere near the standard I'd expect. Had I been advised in advance of the 24hour cancellation notice period, I'd have cancelled my booking and re-booked elsewhere as having on site facilities was one of the principle reasons for my booking. On the final day, courts at the hotel became available and all I'll say is that to have been charged to play

title: Well…it’s a Four Seasons, right?
desc: Since our business started doing well in recent years the Mrs. and I have become “luxury travelers” of sorts, trying to stay at 5-star hotels whenever circumstances permit (cost, availability, Amex Play Fine Hotel and Resorts promotion). Every once in a while, the best choice option under those circumstances is a Four Seasons property. We like when that happens… On this occasion we were planning a once-in-a-lifetime (until next time) 3-month international trip. Multiple countries, multiple cities. Thanks to some good fortune and some very hard work, the Mrs. was able to convert all of our Amex points and Delta miles into two round trip Premium Economy tickets from Seattle to our ultimate destination, Sydney, AUS, flying Singapore Airlines. Insider Pro Tip: Singapore Airlines

title: 5 star for 4 seasons
desc: Everything is good with this hotel. The first day of our stay was rainy, all day so we were provided with an umbrella whenever we go out. Its about 7 min walk to Paragon or Ngee ann and just across the street to Ion Orchard. We were greeted whenever we go back and they will take care of any of your needs. Breakfast was ok, they change the food every day and the coffee was good. No complaints and the room is spacious.

title: Four Seasons Singapore - dont go there
desc: This has to be the worst 5 star hotel I have ever stayed in.After we checked in and got to our room, we found the toilet was blocked. We rang reception to report this. When no one had arrived after 30 mins, I went down to the ground floor to use the bathroom next to the bar. Frankly, it was disgusting. Our room was in very poor condition - stains, chips, dirt. If I had the time I would have checked out immediately. Its sad to see the Four Seasons chain stoop to this level. Never again. Later when we returned to the room, the toilet had been unblocked. However, it was clear that it hadn’t been cleaned properly for some time. I attach a photograph. The poor state of the property was not restricted to the toilets. I attach another photograph of a bedside table in the

title: Perfect for honeymooners and travelers alike
desc: The Four Seasons in Singapore is a genuinely good deal for what they're delivering. We stayed 4 nights in a suite overlooking the city for our honeymoon. The hotel is top notch in service, room quality, views, food, and is tucked away in a quiet part of the city not too far from anything. Contrasted with the madness that is the MBS (we stayed at both, thankfully all but one night at the Four Seasons) for the price we paid this hotel really delivered top notch quality and service. Beds were super comfortable, I loved how everything was nicely scented and appointed, and I'll definitely stay here again.

title: Four Seasons Singapore
desc: By far one of the best Four Seasons I have been to. From the moment of arrival to the moment our taxi pulled away, the service was impeccable. Without a doubt one of the best hotels I have stayed at. There is something very soothing about stepping into the Four Seasons after a day out in the city - it is immersive in the best sense of the word.

title: Lovely stay
desc: We loved our 3 day stay at the four seasons the staff were extremely helpful we arrived early and our room was ready for us. the room was big and airy well decorated and spotless. we used both the pools lower ground and on the roof terrace, sun cream supplied. we would certainly stay there again the food was lovely we had breakfast and evening meal and found the hotel to be well situated. We also stayed at the Marina Bay Sands hotel and thought the four seasons was better in many respects

title: Underwhelmed
desc: We expected more for a stay at Four Seasons, especially on the service front. It was the last hotel we stayed in on a month-long trip to SE Asia and it was the most disappointing. While the staff we encountered during our stay were pleasant enough, we never felt warmly welcomed (except at check in) or even noticed during our stay. There were multiple business conferences going on while we were there last week so the lobby area and car drop off areas were exceptionally busy at all times of the day. Most of the time I felt I was arriving and departing from a mid-range hotel. The decor and layout of the room were nice. But there was a distinct musty/mildew scent when we arrived at our room. When the bellman brought our bags up, he asked if everything was o.k. With the room.

title: Memorable & impressive stay at Four Seasons SG
desc: Hotel is not too big, service was personal and gave a truely WOW hotel experience. All staff met were well trained in service, and professional. The design has mix of modernity(switches/usb) plus class with the antiques displayed. It has been well thought in most areas. Pillow choice was superb. The only feedback perhaps is the tv remote control which is quite troublesome to operate for switching channel. Seems cannot just use up/down.

title: Quintessential Luxury Hotel
desc: We stayed here for 2 nights in a twin room on the 19th floor. Good hotel room with easy access through a corridor to Orchard Road. But what sets this hotel apart is the friendly service. Everyone was very helpful from the porters to the reception to the room staff. I was taken of care fully and everything was completely luxurious. They have a nice gym and steam room along with a pool and tennis courts For more information you can see my full review on my Youtube channel

title: Four Seasons luxury and well located
desc: Excellent hotel that keeps up to the Four Seasons reputation. I was very impressed with their attention to families and children. We were travelling with our two kids, and they had specially placed toiletries for kids in our bathroom, a small gown for my daughter and small slippers for her. Their room service is superb and not badly priced for Singapore. Very clean and beautiful room with perfect finishes and amenities. The gym at the Four Seasons is possibly the “prettiest” gym I’ve had the pleasure of using. As a fussy traveller who enjoys the finer luxuries, I was not left wanting for anything. Location wise, it is also well located walking distance to the famous Orchard Street. I highly recommend this hotel.

title: Solid Four Seasons experience
desc: Centrally located hotel right around corner from several major shopping malls; Marina Bay Sands and major museums less than 10 minute cab ride one way and same, easy 10 min cab other direction up to Botanical Gardens. Rooms attractive and feel recently refreshed. Great Four Seasons experience start to finish. No noise issues (12th floor). Fantastic recent gym renovation and expansion. Solid breakfast- only quibble fresh fruit served not always ripe. Love the Grown Alchemist toiletries (in eco friendly dispensers! Way to go Four Seasons!).

title: Christmas stay
desc: We stayed during the week leading up to christmas and it was my wife's birthday the day prior to us checking in. Unbeknown to us, Four Seasons hotel staff had organised a belated birthday cake and lovely message delievered to our room. It was a nice surprising gesture and goes to show the level of details and service delivery we experienced during our stay.

title: Lovely hotel needing a bit of Improvement
desc: All the staff were friendly and helpful, with a special shout-out to the woman at the concierge desk. Large, pleasant room and bathroom. Loved the chocolate birthday cake! This would be a 5-star review except for a safety issue and an AC challenge. The safety issue - slippery floors. The shower stall floor is very slippery, as is the tile of the bathroom floor. The AC challenge - the comfortable chairs and chaise langue are directly beneath the draft from the AC register. The only place to sit or lounge away from the draft is on the bed.

title: Christmas lunch
desc: The best place in Singapore to experience Christmas lunch with friends and family. We'll thought out menu, the pate was to die for, great ambience and superb service. The hotel as expected was at its best.7 stars

title: Hotel may look nice but service and reception may not up to four seasons that you may think of.
desc: Staffs made me feel like I disturbed them for arriving at the hotel. It is my first time at 4s and no one greeting or show me way to checking in reception or even the room elevator. They just mind to romper and sell table at Nobu, the Japanese restaurant. Hotel itself looks dated.

title: Simply the best.
desc: Always consistent. Excellent service. Everyone knows my name. Rooms are magnificent and clean. Location is strategic. The entire staff is well trained. Especially loved Ronald at the pool who took care of me well and Margie at the front desk who was hands on and very efficient and finally the most courteous and helpful bell staff Azli. I will always stay here.

title: Reservation staff clueless
desc: Emailed confirmed connecting rooms and extra bed. Retracted the confirmation took awhile to honor their emailed confirmation. Surprise that four season hotel does that. Four season hotel should served their clients properly . Thats why we chose four seasons. It felt like an inn when reserving. Not honoring what they have emailed . Quite unprofessional quite not a four seasons hotel

title: Excellent
desc: Overall, I had a great experience, staff was incredibly helpful, and the amenities were great. The room was wonderful, clean, and perfect to celebrate a weekend. Thank you! Will recommend to my colleagues!

title: Location , walkable to metro , luxury rooms , kids friendly hotel
desc: Great location, walkable to metro station, luxury , room was well maintained, rooms r cleaned 3-4 times a day which I experienced for the first time , got early check in , kids loved it as customisation of toiletries, slippers and bathropes were provided, front desk was very friendly , overall was pleasant and memorable stay

title: Four Seasons’ service delivers
desc: Excellent stay. Hotel staff are professional and friendly as you would expect from a Four Seasons hotel. the location is great, very handy to the MRT, Ion shopping centre and a short taxi ride to all the fabulous restaurants in Dempsey. The gym is well equipped and pool areas are nice. We had dinner at Nobu which was fabulous. The hotel itself is looking a bit dated and the breakfast buffet is quite small relative to other Singapore hotels like the Mandarin Oriental however the selection is more than adequate.

title: Amazing staff and great rooms
desc: Always a wonderful experience staying at Four Seasons! From the time I arrive up to the time I leave, my family and I are well cared for and pampered. Each and every request I make is granted. Before I arrive in Singapore, I contact the concierge via whatsap and give them the lineup of restaurants I want to dine in and voila. Just like that, it’s booked. Muz at the concierge is amazing. When I wake up in the morning and go to the gym or swim, Ronald Bierras always takes good care of me and my son. I truly love the personal service at this hotel. Am coming back at the end of April! And the rooms are magnificent by the way

title: HORRIBLE Experience & PLEASE READ BEFORE YOU COME
desc: Finally have time to review this hotel and this is my first review. Full experience was just horrible here. Highly recommend to stay away from this hotel. Inside the room: 1. Phone is broken 2. Door handle is broken 3. A piece of fake nail from previous client is right under a table (very obvious) and pointed out by my 1 yr old baby. 4. Room is dated. Need a refurbishment… thats a suggestment, not a complain. In room dining service: 1. 1st time: a coffee cup is broken.. very dangerous. 2. 2nd time: apparently nothing was delivered after 1-2 hours and walked down to lobby to ask and no one could find my order or know whats going on.. Not acceptable at all 1. A staff could just suddenly come into the room without knocking the door at all (De mot distarb sign on) and turned

title: Superb Hospitality
desc: The hospitality is superb. Room cleaning was twice a day despite CNY peak. Attendants were attentive and value added as appropriate eg placed a mouse pad on the table for me as she noted I didnt have one; provided cleaning solution for my dad’s glasses; promptly sent firmer pillows as the default ones were too soft for my family; arranged the wedding anniversary amenity and made my parents’ day! Really impressive that all the little details are taken care of promptly and with genuine care and concern!

title: Delightful stay at a beautiful hotel in lovely Singapore
desc: Stayed 2 days with wife and teenage kids Fantastic central location close to orchard road shops Very helpful cordial staff Excellent concierge desk Excellent food Beautiful large rooms good bathrooms. Good wifi Delightful stay at a beautiful hotel

title: Lost a bit of magic
desc: We recently returned from staying at the hotel for just over a week. The four seasons is still a wonderful hotel but why we used to return time and time again was because we felt the staff really cared and knew us. There was still a bit of engagement however we felt it was as required by the job description rather than genuine intent. Don't get me wrong it's still a great hotel but it's not special like it used to be pre COVID. Given the price point we will consider other hotels next time we stay in Singapore.

title: Time for a refresh
desc: The property is a bit tired. While we received a friendly welcome when we checked in late at night, the staff rarely looked up from their screens thereafter. What we like about Four Seasons in general is the staff engagement. Asking us how our day went is not difficult but here we felt like they really couldn’t care less. An exception was the pool staff that was very personable and engaging. The breakfast buffet is adequate but there are better spreads at other high end hotels in Singapore. Oddly, you can’t order the eggs yourself but need to flag a waitress to put in the order. By the time it arrives you have already eaten the sides that go with. Again, the staff was professional but not particularly interested in the guest. Room is spacious and bed is very comfortable. Pool

title: White elephant dying soon! (sad to see the service quality of Four seasons go down so fast)
desc: I've stayed at the Four Seasons , in Singapore, at least 10 times (stayed at multiple other of their properties). The thing that has always attracted me to the Four Seasons has been their impeccable service. The one in Singapore also had great service but I see it deteriorating much faster; maybe because it's an older Four Season. The likes of Ritz and St Regis offer much better service at same price points. Their "customer service" is almost a joke now and I think (seriously) it's run by chat bots! Things like Early check in or cancelation of stay, which would often be dealt with empathy earlier now gets you a robot response. I just canceled a room (and paid full for it) as I didn't want to deal with the poor service. The hotel is a bit old but service always made up for it

title: Excellent experience at the Four Seasons in Singapore
desc: Four Seasons for my family was always on the wishlist but for one reason or another, every time we travelled somewhere, we stayed at another location, another chain, not at the Four Seasons. In Singapore we finally made it, we checked in at the Four Seasons on the 5th of January. There are many good chains with excellent services and we've travelled in many places, but we found the experience in this hotel a few classes above the others. It is not perfect - what is perfect? - but in the most important aspects of a travellers' experience it ticks all the boxes. Especially the quality of the people working there is fantastic - they do everything they can to help you, make you feel confortable, make you enjoy being there. The concierge is doing a great job, they get everything

title: Some little hiccups, but otherwise good
desc: We stayed at Four Seasons Singapore during our family vacation since pre-covid times. The exact location of the Four Seasons was not in the busy Orchard Road, but rather on a more remote road which is accessible by foot on a road which wasn't very flat. Therefore it could be troublesome to come with luggage from the MRT station. Upon check-in, unfortunately it was shocking that the connecting room was not catered at the first place (luckily was given to us on the second evening onwards). The rooms itself were very large at 49 square meters each, and had a nice view of Orchard road and far onto Marina Bay Sands. There were also great facilities in the hotel, including a very large gym, two swimming pools, and a spa. To celebrate my parents' wedding anniversary, Four Seasons gave

title: Great location
desc: Excellent location in the Orchard road, the building is a bit old but great service. Staff very helpful they even prepared take away pastries for people who check out very early in the morning. Stayed there a couple of times, definitely will come back

title: “Four Seasons service”
desc: I stayed in several 5* properties in Singapore, definitely, Four Seasons is the one with the best service! Room was pleasant and spacious, cared in every detail, common areas fully answer to 5* standards, but the most remarkable was service…, it was simply unique: the kind of service you only find in “Four Seasons ” hotels. Some small examples: we were 3 people, and in the room all was thought exactly for all the 3 of us, from the water bottles to teeth brushes to slippers …(In other hotels there was always st missing, even basic staff like the extra bed itself!!!) fl fresh water and fruit snack were offered at the pool, hotel facilities were guest’s disposal after check out (in other hotels I was denied to use the pool after check out). Wonderful hotel, strongly recommended!

title: Ok Service, with some gaffes
desc: Once, I encountered someone coughing as he came out of the lift, and i could hear him coughing along the corridor as the lift doors closed. On another occasion, someone entered the lift, coughing heavily inside that enclosed space. In both cases, the guests didn't even bother to cover their mouths. Thirdly, when I was checking-in, someone simply stretched out her hand to put her card on the counter, stood there for a while, before muttering "check-out", and left. Perhaps i was transparent and she could not see that the receptionist was serving me. Such entitled behavior. I was somehow reminded of how a prankster handed Theresa May a P45 during her party conference in 2017. Negative guest experience largely due to the encounters at Jiang Nan Chun and one-ninety I ordered

title: Stellar hotel with excellent service
desc: The Four Seasons hotel lives up to its name and reputation in this gem of a hotel located in Orchard. Stellar service by excellent staff. From the time we walked in, we were impressed by the friendliness and care given by the staff. Our room was beautiful with complete amenities (coffeemaker, kettle, dryer, safe, water, etc). The beds were very comfortable and the bathroom area was really spacious. We celebrated a special occasion and Margie ( the front desk staff) surprised us with cake! Its that level of service with attention to details that sets Four Seasons apart from all the other hotels. Location was also excellent. Its a 2 minute walk to the subway and its located right next to the Orchard shopping area. I highly recommend this hotel and will certainly stay here again.

title: Heartwarming Services
desc: All staff members are friendly, and I experienced outstanding services. Cara Thor. Director of Quality Assurance, was superb. I asked the front desk to check the shower drainage in my room because I felt water went down slowly. That afternoon, I noticed water went down fast. That evening Ms Thor personally visited my room and thanked me for reporting the problem. I felt that she truly wanted all her guests to be comfortable while they were staying in this hotel. Indeed, I was totally comfortable with Four Seasons Hotel in Singapore.

title: The only place to stay
desc: If you’ve reached a time in your life when only the best will do then look no further: this luxurious hotel is a haven of peace and tranquillity where every member of staff will treat you like royalty. The rooms are spacious and comfortable, the bathroom is beautiful. Breakfast is sublime: you are presented with the finest foods from around the globe served with a smile. We love this place, I guarantee you will too.

title: Singapore’s trip
desc: We had a good time, when we were staying in this hotel. Staff was very polite and friendly. In general our impression was nice, as usual in this chain of hotel. Variety dish of breakfast could be better.

title: Wonderful hidden jewel
desc: Want a wonderful stay I had at the Four Seasons in Singapore I have been to a lot off FS around the world. And they all ways look on the pictures how they are on real life. But I was really blown away how wonderful this resort was. It looks so much more beautiful in real life!!! Next to that Rooms are beautiful View was stunning.. And most of all impeccable staf That made my stay flawless I had dinner at nobu what was also s big treat Till soon

title: Slow check in and a little more for hospitality and care to make it as remarkable Four Seasons.
desc: Good location near ION Orchard, high quality of bed, large room with standard room facility, lovely gym and equipments. What I think this may not be like others Four Seasons I have been (Hawaii, Chiangmai, Chiengrai, Bangkok or Samui) are 1) Slow check-in (even I did in advance) 2) Level of hospitality and attention.

title: Perfect for families
desc: The room was very comfortable as it was big, interior decor was classy yet modern. Even with 3 suitcases we were able to open all of them and still plenty of space left in the room. The location was excellent, it is only a 5-10 minutes walk to Orchard MRT and half of the walk is covered.

title: 5* start hotel
