desc: Very good customer service - polite and extremely helpful. Overall service was outstanding. The staff in the bar were very kind. Breakfast 👌🏼 Gym 👌🏼 Room 👌🏼 Location of the hotel was excellent allowing access to restaurants and shopping. I would highly recommend this hotel, gives your stay a more personal feeling. Thank you for a lovely stay.

title: Outstanding
desc: This hotel was excellent with outstanding staff. It was my first stay at the Four Seasons in Singapore and it is now my hotel of choice. Big rooms, very clean big TV’s in the room and the pool was fantastic with clean beds and attentive staff

title: Beyond Exceptional
desc: We recently had an extraordinary four-night stay at the Four Seasons Singapore. I would normally make special note of individual employees who provided exemplary service but I would exceed the word count for the review. Every individual we interacted with ranging from within the Club, gym, pool, restaurants, bar, housekeeping, spa, concierge, bell, front desk, and management were over the top in their helpfulness, friendliness, and professionalism. This hotel truly has a 6-star team. In relation to the hotel itself: Level three has been totally renovated and now has the best hotel gym we have encountered. Think tennis court converted into a very large and well-equipped gym. Every piece of equipment you could imagine has been installed: treadmills, elliptical, bikes,

title: Amazing Gym
desc: First time staying. Great hotel with best gym. Room was of good size and bed heavenly. Breakfast was busy but you can see that staff go above and beyond. Service is what you would expect of a Four Seasons hotel. Will stay again if I come back this way.

title: Excellent Quality & Service as you’d expect of the 4 Seasons - Price to Match.
desc: Stayed here on a four day trip to Singapore. Convenient for Orchard Drive and the metro stations. The hotel itself is of a standard you would expect of the 4 Seasons. It has a outside pool on the 3rd & top floor. It has a couple of restaurants that serve excellent breakfasts and dinners. Prices are top end as you’d expect but service and quality are excellent.

title: Exceeded our expectations
desc: Everything about our stay from a much needed early check in (we arrived from a red eye flight and were exhausted), to in room dining service, bar and pool service, and concierge recommendations exceeded our expectations. We would absolutely recommend this location to anyone traveling to Singapore. The location is close to great shopping on Orchard Blvd as well as very close to a main train station. Every staff member we met went above and beyond to assist us with all of our needs. Oh and breakfast- the breakfast buffet was fantastic. Can't say enough good things about this hotel- it was great.

title: Discrimination
desc: Adults only pool - staff allow children in. Only reason I got, the parents want their children with them. Escalated to two managers who had no interest in sorting the issues. There is a family pool on the rooftop which children can use. Shame four seasons own policy is ignored and management have no interest in resolution. Let’s the hotel down.

title: Great Stay at Four Season Singapore
desc: This is truly a great hotel property. It is well located on a quieter street one block off Orchard Rd, it has an impressive physical plant, modern and comfortable guest rooms, great service, and an awesome breakfast buffet

title: Best hotel in Singapore
desc: Great hotel, great location and best staff in SIngapore. Highly recommend for anyone wanting to pamper themselves in Singapore. Location is 2 minutes from Orchard Road so perfect for walking around and shopping.

title: Birthday Stay
desc: Concierge Team was very accommodating, led by Muz. He is an asset to the hotel. Provided great service along the way, recommended places to go with pets. Made arrangements for my family. Hotel has two EV chargers which is great for EV car owners. Concierge was quick when I requested for help to turn on the charging systems.

title: Better than expected.
desc: No complaints whatsoever. In fact, after reading some of the reviews we were expecting significantly less, but the FourSeasons Hotel held its ground! Everything about our stay was great. Arriving at 7am, we were greeted by friendly staff and invited to refresh, relax and have breakfast. The breakfast was great, and the kids loved it too so that was a bonus!! Every day we all ate far too much, but we just couldn't resist. Bedroom was great. We were on the 10th floor and had great views. The lounge and pool on level 3 was great, and we used it lots. No kids under 16 though... There is a 2nd pool (for the family) on the roof (Level 20) and this was always quiet. Concierge staff were exceptional. Always helpful, friendly and polite. The kids were really sad to say goodbye.

title: A wedding stay nothing short of excellent
desc: My wife and I spent 4 nights at the Four Seasons Singapore when we flew into the country for our wedding. From arrival to checkout, the team was attentive and dedicated in ensuring that our stay was as pleasant and memorable as possible. We had 2 bookings - the Boulevard Room and the Executive Suite. While the Boulevard Room was larger than expected and sufficiently expansive for a solo traveller or couple, the Executive Suite was impressive in both its size, quality, and internal decor. Having used the suite for the frenzy that is bridal prep and makeup for a team of bridesmaids, it provided both space and luxury for the preparations. The only thing better than quality of the hotel's rooms was it's quality of service. Cara Thor (Quality Assurance), Carol Luo and Thawdar Khin

title: Fantastic Hotel in a Great Location
desc: Excellent hotel that lives up to everything you would expect from a top notch hotel. We arrived in Singapore on an early morning flight. We had pre-arranged airport transportation with the hotel. When we arrived at the Four Seasons around 7am we were greeted at the car, escorted directly to a waiting room and checked in. After a 17hour flight from Los Angeles this was well appreciated. The room was spotless, well appointed and very comfortable. We ate breakfast twice at the hotel. This is one of the best hotel breakfasts you'll experience. The staff were incredible and would quickly take care of any requests. This hotel had one of the best fitness centers I've ever seen. It was spacious and broken into different zones, providing plenty of space and just about any piece of

title: The Singapore Four Seasons Never Disappoints
desc: The Singapore Four Seasons never disappoints us on our annual visits there. In addition to a lovely, well-appointed room, their facilities are all first rate. The breakfast buffet is among the most lavish that we've ever experienced. The lap pool on the 3rd floor is a perfect 25 meters with lanes and hardly every used. The new gym is world class. In addition to the One Ninety casual restaurant, there is food available in the cozy bar next to it. There are also an excellent, high end Cantonese restaurant, a Nobu Peruvian Japanese and another casual dining option on the 3rd floor overlooking the pool. The location on quiet Orchart Blvd allows easy access to shopping on Orchard Road, the wonderful MRT subway and is convenient to the fabulous Singapore Botanic Garden. But it is the

title: Lovely stay again
desc: Nothing is as good as the Four Seasons Singapore, and we've stayed in a few properties over the years. The staff are excellent. The hotel is maintained to top standards. In fact the gym upgrade is outstanding! And there is now an executive lounge. The bed is so comfortable and there is a pillow menu as well. The location is perfect for us, right at the start of Orchard road. This is our go to hotel.

title: Good business hotel, nothing for kids.
desc: We stayed in this hotel with 2 young kids. In our last trip to Singapore we stayed in Shangri-la which was incredibly child friendly hotel. This time we wanted to enjoy Four Season's service hoping that there would be some sort of child-friendliness by default. Rooms were very comfortable as we expected from Four Seasons. There was nothing for kids. It was a nice touch that hotel provided kids slippers, organic kids shampoo and tooth paste in the room for kids but that was it. The family pool on the roof top was too small. With kids we were not allowed to use the main pool. Breakfast was average. Western breakfast items were limited. Good for a business hotel but not good for a family to stay.

title: Wonderful stay
desc: Four Seasons hotel is one of the best hotels I’ve ever had the pleasure of staying at, second to none breakfast and a truly welcoming staff that made you feel at home from the moment you arrived. Stunning interiors and rooms, loved the adults only pool area and the gym, five star experience

title: Fantastic, family-friendly hotel
desc: One of the best family-friendly hotels we have stayed at. It was the ideal hotel to stay in Singapore for a couple of nights. Excellent access to transport links and in a nice quiet area of town. The extra touches to welcome our 3 old were very nice. They welcomed her with a Teddy, the room had been set up with a child step (to reach the taps), child toiletries and toothbrush. Even a mini gown and slippers! Every morning they gave her child's cutlery, cup and plate. Generous sized rooms, very comfortable beds, amazing breakfast, and excellent gym facilities. Overall, it is an excellent hotel that lives up to its name. Would not hesitate to stay here again.

title: Damp smell and wet patch in room! Late check in!
desc: We are staying at the hotel now. Checked in today. We had 3 rooms booked. Our rooms were not ready at 3pm as per check in time. We had to wait for 45 mins to get all our rooms to be ready. This was not welcomed. Upon entering my room, there was a damp smell. It was only after the air conditioning was switched on for awhile before the damp smell sort of disappeared. On the carpet, there was a wet patch which I suspect must be the cause of the smell. I rang housekeeping and the supervisor came and inspected the room. She then called in a staff with a dehumidifying machine. It is now running in my room which I hope will not disturb our sleep tonight. For the wet patch on the carpet, they simply placed a towel to "soak it up". Considering the hotel is a Four Seasons Hotel, I feel

title: Nice hotel
desc: Excellente and vibrant location in orchard district . The room spacious , clean and comfortable. Great Breakfast. The staff very professional and helpful. Nice swimming pool on the roof and the GYM is fully equipped. Nearby luxurious malls.

title: Simply Superb !
desc: From the moment of stepping or checking in the hotel, the feelings were good. I was greeted and treated with respect at the entrance and at the counter. The checking in was fast and accurate. Amazingly, I was being led to the room with detailed explanation about the hotel by Assistant Front Office Manager; Mervin. Where in the executive club lounge which is a new addition since last year, I was awed by the clean layout and decorations. Comprehensively, the club lounge serves breakfast, high tea and evening cocktails. It was led by Sakina and Miku san and their serviced oriented staff. There is always something one can do in the hotel be it a workout in the new, modern and well equipped gym, laze around the 02 swimming lapped pools (3rd and top floor) with jacuzzi or relaxing

title: Staycation at Four Seasons
desc: Stayed at Four Seasons for a short staycation with friends, and it was a pleasant experience. Checkin was very efficient, and the staff were friendly. Breakfast at 190 had an alright selection, staff seemed busy and slightly shorthanded. Rooms were clean and well maintained. Pool on the top floor was small, but the view was fantastic. Overall experience was quite satisfactory.

title: Nice and comfortable stay
desc: So first impression was great, we where diverted terminals at Changi Airport, which FS singapore picked upon and we where greeted in the arrivals area and taken to our transfer car. Upon arrival to the hotel we where greeted at the front door by staff who took us directly ton our room and checked us in our room which was a very nice touch. After checking in we noticed they had decorated our room with rose petals and balloons along with chocolate covered strawberries as our trip was for our 1st wedding anniversary again a nice welcome. The room itself we had an executive suite, now don’t let this confuse you this doesn’t allow access to the executive lounge a bit disappointing you have to have a 1 bedroom executive room for that to reduce the confusion I would recommend

title: Can't Fault, Fantastic Service, and Great Location for Visiting Singapore
desc: From the moment we arrived (2 adults and 2 teenagers), the staff ensured that we were truly taken care of for the 6 nights we stayed. All staff always greeted us on arriving/leaving the hotel- reception, concierge and bell staff. Happy to give us advice on travel, places to visit and also book taxi transport when we didn't catch the MRT which was only a 7-10 min walk. Cara Thor was exceptional, getting to know us, then providing us with places to see, dining options and organising reservations and making sure we were taken care of at breakfast, ensuring we received wonderful Singapore/local dishes too including Kaya Toast, Chili Crab Omlette, Carrot Cake and fruits! Whilst all staff provided us with excellent service, in particular Alex, Anne at the breakfast reception,

title: An amazing hotel, an extremely helpful team in one of the best cities
desc: Cant fault anything in our stay, everything was 100%. This was a week-long family vacation and I would say we couldn't have picked up a better place to stay. Ideal for everything inc location etc with plenty of restaurant options. Overall - extremely satisfied

title: Four seasons
desc: A wonderful hotel highly recommend staff exceptional rooms exceptionally clean and comfortable pool lovely and relaxing breakfast caters for every type of traveller and age group highly recommend staying at this hotel

title: Four Season at its Best
desc: Started our Asia trip with two nights in Singapore at the Four Seasons. Arrived very early from a very long flight from the US. Hotel was very accommodating and able to get us checked in earlier then was expected. Hotel is in a really nice shopping area of Singapore and a quick ride to the main tourist spots either by cab or metro. Rooms extremely comfortable and service was on point at all times. Special thanks to Cara Thor who introduced herself to us one morning at breakfast and made sure we were taken care of during our stay. She even arranged for a small box of chocolates for us to have at check out for our onward journey. Perfect way to start our Asia trip.

title: Like starting a meal with dessert!
desc: Singapore was our first stop in a trip to the South East of Asia and the Four Seasons was by far the best part as it set the tone for the rest of our trip. From the stellar recommendations from the concierge desk to the amazing housekeeping staff to the incredibly mouthwatering food options for breakfast and dinner (we missed lunch), the Four Seasons delivered on its promise on all counts and then went on to deliver even more. Looking forward to future stays!

title: Would love to return
desc: Was there for a meeting and felt everything was well taken care of. Staff was extremely polite, they greet you when you leave and return. Hotel seemed to be well managed. Would be a bonus for lobby bar to open till a later time. Would love to return.

title: Great hotel, location, amazing service! Look no further
desc: Extremely comfortable beddings (we have decided to buy their linen), attentive staff all around, from check in desk to concierge to restaurant staff. All very pleasant interactions, all determined to make their guests happy ( not pretentious at all). The location is great for shopping as really close to Orchard road. In room dining was fantastic, the breakfast at the restaurant had a good selection and was varied from one day to the other. There was Asian and western food selections. Eggs Benedict, waffles, pancakes, exotic fruits, different variety of breads, cakes, sausages, bacon, etc. There was also an Indian section (not sure if it is there everyday as stayed for two days). The staff went out of their way to make sure we were comfortable. We didn’t get the most

title: Awesome vacation, Four Seasons Singapore!
desc: Absolutely stunning, great staff and the best breakfast I have ever had! Housekeeping was always in tact never missed a beat had our room very clean, well stocked with towels, water etc. The team at this hotel are extremely qualified and professional and care about you, trust me! Thank you Four Seasons Singapore for a great memorable vacation!

title: Four Excellent Seasons!
desc: Second time staying here and after travelling through Asia for twenty years it's hard to beat the hospitality at Four Seasons Singapore. Attentive staff, excellent breakfast, full gym and was upgraded to a suite which was unexpected and fantastic. Can't wait to come back!

title: Thank you Four Seasons Hotel!
desc: My family and I just got back from our quick vacation in Singapore with the Four Seasons Hotel as our home for 4 days and 3 nights and the I will say that the reputation, and brand, of the Four Seasons was everything we expected and much, much more. The lobby was not massive, nor was it modern, but it shouted old glamour which was a very pleasant welcome. The staff…exceptional!!! They went out of their to ensure that we had a pleasant stay. The front desk person, Reine, asked me if we were there for a vacation and if we were celebrating something and I mentioned to her in conversation it was my birthday the day before. The very next day, there was. birthday cake in our room…very accommodating and very classy. I wish I got the name of the person out front and at the lobby

title: The 4 Seasons That Has Motel 6 Toilet Paper
desc: As a lover of the Four Seasons chain all in all this hotel wasn't what I expected. When I booked with the idea that I was going to Singapore "place of the future and greatest small country in the world" I imagined that I was about to live the best FOUR SEASONS I had ever encountered.. hell my excitement was through the roof but alas it misses out on details that just leave you remembering other FOUR SEASONS. Funnily enough one of the biggest let downs was the toilet paper... yes the toilet paper... I've had better toilet paper at a Motel 6 in the US (felt like half ply literally) and I don't know about you but paying that amount for crappy toilet paper is odd as hell. Another let down was the Sauna... I was expecting this gorgeous wooden paradise made of new fine woods but

title: Beautiful Hotel in Great Location
desc: A classically beautiful hotel in the heart of Singapore with fabulous staff who treat you like royalty! The lobby is adorned with fresh flowers including Singapore orchids in beautiful pinks and reds. The rooms are plush and spotless and the bathrooms are gorgeous. Had a magnificent dinner at “Nobu”……but be sure to book ahead it’s all that it’s cracked up to be and more but leave room for desert……superb!

title: In urgent need of renovation
desc: Pro:  central location and friendly staff. Cons: worn-out room and in general need of renovation and a la carte menu for breakfast was non-existing only some a la carte eggs options. Breakfast had the impression of a factory line, although the food was good this is not what I expect from the brand. Unfortunately nothing special was placed in the room for the arrival. Not worth the price that they are asking and questionable if this is what Four Seasons has become as a brand.

title: Good choice for families
desc: Had a wonderful time here during a summer family vacation, enroute to Bali. The staff went above and beyond to celebrate my birthday. At Nobu we did the Omakase for 4 and the Cantonese restaurant (I forget the name) both were excellent. There was a cake for me at Nobu, another cake at the Cantonese restaurant, a cake in my room, and a blueberry pancake cake at breakfast. I was totally spoiled. We had a beautiful spacious suite and my teenage boys were in a spacious double bed room; and oh the best pillow in any hotel I’ve ever experienced. If you’d like firm pillows like me, do you check out their pillow menu! Lovely hotel in the city, conveniently located and a short walk away from the metro.

title: Relaxing transit thanks to Four Seasons Hotel
desc: Highly recommend Four Seasons Singapore for a transit or longer term holiday while in Singapore. Staff friendliness and the room was amazing. Even though it was only a one day business transit trip. I stayed here for 2 weeks in 2022, the mixologist at the bar was so accommodating in selecting the most perfect cocktails for my guests and I.The room especially the bed is so comfortable... I was checking out the label to see where I can buy the bed, it was that comfortable. :)

title: excellent and classy service
desc: This is a bit of a grand dame of Singapore. This was one of the first luxury properties before the giant hotels near the Marina appeared. But it is still my favorite. The property does not have the opulence of places like the Ritz or the Sands, but it is tranquil and the staff's service is impeccable. When minor things go wrong the staff tries very hard to make it up, and this is where the Four Seasons shines. There are certainly other places with good services, but the staff here really seems to care. I have been coming here for 20 years and did notice a lot more kids the last few times. Maybe this is a sign of the times, but it makes for a more "lively" breakfast for certain.

title: Generally positive
desc: The experience was generally positive, but there are areas requiring improvement. Positives: Location, spacious rooms, housekeeping, bell desk, executive club Areas requiring improvement: Breakfast venue Number of Restaurants Food variety Front desk Sound proofing inside the suite

title: Great leader of a nice property
desc: On 22nd June, it was busy for breakfast. TOBIAS EMMER the manager was leading his staff, working on the floor, helping staff setup the tables and welcome guests. Lucky team to have leader like Tobias!

title: Excellent service
desc: Very satisfied with my stay there recently. I had an early 5am check-out and they offered coffee to be sent up to the room and booking a taxi, in addition to the usual wake-up calls. All a very nice touch!

title: A great location
desc: If you are looking for a great location within Singapore for shopping and dining, look no further. The staff at the Four Seasons Singapore is beyond compare. Their level of engagement and attentiveness was absolutely refreshing. Cara Thor is an absolute rockstar that made us feel like we were the only guests at the hotel. I can not say enough good things about this location, the food an drinks were on point ,and I only wish that we had more time that we could have spent thare,

title: Best hotel ever
desc: If you have not had the pleasure of staying at the Four Seasons- it is worth every penny. Staff knows your name, goes out of the way to make sure you have the best experience. They booked a reservation for us and called while we were there to make sure we liked it!

title: Michelin Starred (Dine & Service)
desc: Enjoyed Vacation at FSS partly due to Services by the Staffs who are so accountable... Executive Lounge's Team namely Ridhwan, Saufi, Ahbi Sheik (Chef), Franky (Chef), besides Interns Aisyah & Pyalyang...keep up the good work ! Quality of Food & Presentation almost a Perfect 10/10 Not to forget Room Cleaner Mr Jack also shined in his own way...speedy response and very clean indeed in getting our room ready... Thank You !

title: Amazing!
desc: Amazing. Excellent room and services. Location can’t be beat for shopping and restaurants. Easy walk to the ION center and MRT. The club lounge is amazing and beats any lounge I have seen. Not your average lounge. Worth the upgrade for the amazing breakfast as well as the afternoon tea/drinks/canapés including russian caviar and a spanish iberico prosciutto carving station. Great for families.

title: Great location…but not much else
desc: Having stayed at a number of Four Seasons properties around the world, I wasn’t very impressed with this hotel, apart from the location. The common areas in the hotel need renovating and don’t reflect four seasons standards in my view. The room we were given had a “view” apparently which wasn’t very good. The check in and check out, weren’t great and we had to wait ages for our luggage to come to our room. Apart from the location of the hotel, I wasn’t impressed which was a shame. Not sure, if we just stayed during a busy week - but didn’t reflect the Four Season standard unfortunately.

title: Outstanding Service
desc: Ihad an incredible experience at the Four Seasons Hotel in Singapore, thanks to Margie's exceptional service. Not only did Margie go above and beyond to ensure my stay was comfortable, but she also surprised me by upgrading us to a suite remembering my birthday. Her attention to detail and thoughtfulness truly made me feel special. From the warm welcome to the personalized touches throughout my stay, Margie's service was outstanding. I highly recommend the Four Seasons Hotel in Singapore, and I am grateful to Margie for making my birthday celebration even more memorable.

title: Amazing !
desc: The pillows are the fluffiest The breakfast is amazing and so is the service The location is great too. It's a bit dated and the corridors have a lill smell but the rooms were spacious and up to date in terms of technology with automatic curtains which open as soon as u enter the room

title: Don't hesitate to book your stay at the Four Seasons Hotel Singapore!
desc: Great hotel located on Orchard Street, right in the middle of great shopping and dining hot spots. Staff, service and rooms are all top notch, as to be expected at a Four Seasons. Concierge staff very helpful and accommodating. Everything is as it should be and nothing less. You'll definitely have a great stay if you book your room here!

title: Four season hotel Singapore
desc: I’m a loyal customer with four seasons hotels all over the worlds and this hotel is my second home, Singapore four season need to be more flexible with customers and need more training for the staff to be more professional and helpful…. I hope the second time when I visit four seasons Singapore to be more improved please

title: not a pleasant experience to Four seasons brand!!
desc: need a lot of education and training to basic staffs, loads of space for improvement!! but the senior management are very polite and helpful and if the staffs can maintain the same standard as senior mangement, we can verify the service of "Four Season"

title: Elegant and comfortable stay
desc: Overall, the Four Seasons Hotel Singapore is elegant and comfortable, with very comfortable amenities and bedding in the rooms, making for a very comfortable trip. My daughters also loved it. Compared to previous stays at Ritz Carlton or Mandarin Oriental hotels, or luxury hotels such as the Luxury Collection or W that I have stayed at as a Marriott member, the Four Seasons in Singapore has no particular shortcomings, but also no particular surprises. It is average. During check-in, the front desk was actually quite chaotic, and customers before and after us expressed quite a bit of displeasure, making the entire check-in process very tense. We were not suite or VIP guests, and our stay was actually average, with no customer recognition and no different responses. At Ritz,

title: Hotel Stay at Four Seasons
desc: Was there to attend a wedding. Rooms are spacious and well-appointed. Service is top notch. Was given an upgrade to a city-view room, which was very much appreciated. Breakfast was unfortunately too busy.

title: Exception stay in a great hotel
desc: We stayed at the Four Seasons Singapore for a few nights and the experience was great. The hotel and staff were excellent with great attention to detail. The service and facilities were top notch and it's proximity to Orchard Road was perfect. Anyone visiting Singapore should try the Four Seasons for an unforgettable stay : )

title: First time but definitely not the last......
desc: Went for a short birthday staycation over last weekend over at Four Seasons Singapore! Was greeted by Ellie at the Front Desk who assisted with the check-in. As our room was not ready when we arrive, Ellie brough us up to the Pool House for us to chill from the hot weather, while we wait for our room. We were also treated to drinks while waiting at the Pool House. Once our room was ready, Ellie escorted us up to our magnificent room located on the 15th floor. Ellie ensured that we were comfortable before leaving us. Later, the Bellman Jaafar, come up to to sent our bag, Jaafar was polite and kind enough to even help us to put out luggage up on the luggage rack. When we went out for Dinner, the Concierge/Bellboys were always so cheerfully greeting us while rendering

title: Superb stay, staff are the stars
desc: We had an absolutely beautiful experience at the four seasons. It was hard to leave the room and go out to explore Singapore. The staff are the shining stars of this place, they are so kind and gracious and can’t do enough for you. They spoilt us so much and made us feel like we were the only people there. From the door men and bell hop, to the r front desk, the room attendants, the staff in the property restaurants, everyone was exceptional. We got upgraded without asking, that was so appreciated. Yes the place could use a renovation, but it is still a beautiful and luxurious and clean property. Please note that the pool is not heated and even though Singapore is so hot, it was too cold for us - and nobody else was in the pool so I’m guessing it’s an issue. Come on bill

title: a fine hotel
desc: a fine hotel indeed. albiet an old one but the rooms are fresh and refurbished. our suite was lovely and the chinese restaurant was the best meal we had in singapore. the service was great though one staff was more comfortable speaking chinese than english

title: Excellent hotel.
desc: Wonderful stay in this hotel, all our wishes and expectations were fulfilled, the staff was excellent and very helpful every time we had an issue or needed help, there was always someone we could rely on. The location is good, walking distance from Orchard road and easy for taxi or the local “grab” . The room was big enough to accommodate a family with two teenagers.. kept very clean and the bed s had crispy white sheets. Breakfast was amazing, lots of different kinds of food to choose from. The bar has some very good cocktails. We didn’t have time to try the pool and the spa…but we visited the Nobu. Wonderful service and great food…. I am glad I chose this hotel for our first stay in Singapore. Fully recommend!!!

title: Perfect !
desc: Marvellous - in every aspect. Location is walking distance from shopping precinct. The room is large and the house keepers have great attention to detail! I left my reading glasses and laptop out in the room and they left a fibre glass cloth with it and a mouse pad (thought that was really cute!). The body wash, soap and lotion they provide smells delicious- my husband kept saying he just wanted to eat me. The bring you an international buffet breakfast which satisfied all my cravings. The staff are lovely. Fantastic experience, and can’t wait to return !

title: A hotel that is stuck in the 90s
desc: I stayed at the Four Seasons Hotel - Singapore for four nights with my family. It was my first visit to Singapore, and I chose the Four Seasons due to the brand and the usual experience I am used to receiving from this hotel chain. However, the FS Singapore surely does not keep up to the high standards associated with the brand name, and was a huge disappointment. The hotel feels like it is a fancy hotel from the 90s and did not evolve ever since, in terms of rooms, and overall service. First, the rooms are very noisy from neighboring rooms and the corridor. One thing that I really do not expect from big hotel chains, is the noisiness as usually this is taken into consideration when upgrading the hotel. There is also not enough storage space within the room. (The room keys

title: FOUR SEASONS HOTEL SINGAPORE
desc: Excellent hotel! Great people! Unparalleled luxury! Genuine care! A true member of "FOUR SEASONS" hotels! If you visit Singapore, stay at FOUR SEASONS HOTEL SINGAPORE and you will remember it for ever!

title: Business Trip
desc: Business trip for one week. Very enjoyable stay. All amenities and staff great. Felt like I was at home. Highly recommended. Location was very good and breakfast was superb. Staff always go out of their way to assist without being intrusive.

title: Wonderful upgraded facilities
desc: I always love staying at The Four Seasons Hotel Singapore. The last time was just before the pandemic. It was great coming back and seeing new additions - a new and much larger gym, NOBU Singapore, The Pool House, among others.

title: Expectations well and truly exceeded.
desc: My family and I had a wonderful stay at the Four Seasons. We were very well taken care of by all staff. The Executive Club exceeded our expectations. Great attention to detail. Staff consistently went out of their way to ensure our expectations were met. Absolute best location for shopping.
